name: Fast Healer
text: You benefit greatly from your healing, be it from spells or natural healing.
benefit: When you regain hit points by resting or through magical healing, you recover additional hit points equal to half your Constitution modifier (minimum +1).
text_zh: 你能够从治疗中获得更大的收益，无论它是来自魔法还是自然地伤口愈合。
benefit_zh: 当你通过休息或者魔法治疗恢复HP时，你能够额外恢复HP，数值等同于你的体质修正的一半（最低+1）。
